# `LabelsFilter` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| entities | [`LabelEntity[]`](labelentity-definition.md) | Yes | A list of labels to filter by. Articles matching any of the specified labels can be accessed. |
